tool_description: Extracts and validates GPS coordinates from various input formats to determine foraging location for regional species matching.

elevation_meters.description: Elevation above sea level in meters

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude must be -180 to 180
Poor GPS accuracy: Location accuracy should be better than 100 meters for reliable species matching
Coordinates in ocean: Provided coordinates appear to be over water, not suitable for terrestrial foraging
usage: Input latitude and longitude coordinates. Optionally provide accuracy_meters and elevation_meters for more precise regional matching. Validates coordinates before regional analysis.
